name: Human
description: Humans are known for their versatility and ambition, often excelling in a variety of fields due to their adaptability and determination.

name: Elf
description: Elves are known for their grace, agility, and connection to nature, often possessing keen senses and a mystical heritage.

name: Dwarf
description: Dwarves are sturdy and resilient, known for their toughness, craftsmanship, and strong sense of tradition.
